Portfolio

This portfolio page showcases the projects done by team 3.

Get Started

Team Portfolio

All projects in this portfolio have been completed by members of team 3. These projects showcase our team's skills and portray how we have adapted to the new technology based on what we learned as a part of cohort 2 at John Jay's CUNY Tech Talent Pipeline Residency Program.

Team Members

Joginder

Kaur

"I like to learn new things to make myself better at what I do and this bootcamp gave me the opportunity to do that by turning us into full-stack developers. I enjoyed collaborating with my team members to create various prototype websites. As much as I enjoy web development, I see myself becoming a cybersecurity specialist in the tech industry so I can work along with other professionals in the field to protect Americans from cyberattacks."

Britney

Wu

"I enjoy making web applications and seeing them come to life which is why my goal is to become a Full-Stack Developer. It was a pleasure to work with this team because I was able to share my ideas, learn and enhance my skills in Web Development as a result. In addition to practical experience with the technologies mentioned, I gained invaluable soft skills such as communication and teamwork over Slack and Zoom."

Cherrise

Hatcher

"During my time with team three and the TTP Cohort, I've gained the abilities to collaborate and create several projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Gatsby, React, Node.js, and Python. My ultimate goal is to work with artificial intelligence by using machine learning. For as long as I can remember, I've wanted to make something that most people couldn't live without after using it. By using the information I've learned, I want to optimize our world."

Janelia

Thompson

Adaptable Software Developer. Excellent problem solving skills and ability to work under pressure. Exceptional written and verbal communication skills. Capable of working well with fellow developers and remaining on-schedule with responsibilities.

Reagan

Asubonteng

"Through the TTP Bootcamp, I've gained extensive knowledge of Javascript, CSS, HTML, and React components to further my career goals. In the future, I will be working under a web engineering internship to gain work experience before diving into the field. I have created advertising events sites, interactive user budgeting and tracking apps, and dynamic corporate prototype sites with the project."

Eitan

Khiyaev

"During the TTP residency I have realized that I wanted to specialize in web development because it lets me combine my two passions of design and coding. Working with a team helped me learn to ,troubleshoot, adapt, and collaborate by using tools such as git, slack, and GitHub."

Shiven

Nayee

"I am a Computer Science Student graduating in December 2021 trying to become a Software Engineer. I have worked with various software and languages, however I have the most experience with java, Javascript and Python. As a Software Engineer I would like to learn more about developing the back end and APIs that would be used on the front end."

Fakhreddine

Chaabani

"During the short period that I have spent in the TTP bootcamp, I was honored to work on multiple projects and produce, with my team, top-tier functional websites. I have software programming background, and with the help of this bootcamp and my teammates, I was able to brush up on my skills and expand my knowledge while learning new languages such as Node JS and React."
